summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued to Samantha DiMisa by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding her appearance on August 20, 2019, to testify and produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The subpoena includes an attached rider detailing advice of rights and instructions for document production.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman

connections.description: DiMisa is subpoenaed to testify and produce all materials relating to Epstein, indicating she possesses information or documents relevant to the investigation into him.
Berman, as U.S. Attorney, issued the grand jury subpoena commanding DiMisa's appearance and document production.

events.title: Scheduled Grand Jury Appearance of Samantha DiMisa
events.description: Samantha DiMisa is commanded to appear before the grand jury at the U.S. Courthouse in Foley Square to testify and give evidence regarding alleged violations of federal law.

events.title: Issuance of Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: The subpoena is issued and dated, commanding Samantha DiMisa's appearance and document production.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Samantha DiMisa was subpoenaed to appear before a federal grand jury investigating Jeffrey Epstein in August 2019.
The subpoena demanded production of 'All materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein,' including text messages, emails, social media messages, documents, and notes.
The alleged violations under investigation included conspiracy (18 U.S.C. ยง 371), false statements (18 U.S.C. ยง 1001), and destruction of records (18 U.S.C. ยง 1519).
The subpoena was issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York under U.S. Attorney Geoffrey S. Berman.
The document indicates an active federal grand jury investigation into Epstein was ongoing in the Southern District of New York in August 2019.
